name: hata
description: Common HTTP errors to be used with express.js or whatever engine you use.

scripts.postcoverage: if [ -f coverage/lcov.info ]; then node node_modules/.bin/map-coverage && mv coverage/lcov.info coverage/lcov-raw.info && mv coverage/lcov-mapped.info coverage/lcov.info; fi
scripts.sendcoverage: if [ -f coverage/lcov.info ]; then cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/codecov.io/bin/codecov.io.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/.bin/codacy-coverage; fi

author: Louay Alakkad <louay@alakkad.me>
